channel.title: How to restore old wallet with key files
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
QT Wallet: is currently synchronising. Operating System and version: win 10 If web wallet browser name and version: If desktop wallet (Qt or Client) block # of your client and # of connections:
Please advise how to restore my old wallet with key files only. No wallet.dat files or recovery password is available.
Many thanks

item.title: How to restore old wallet with key files
item.dc:creator: @Craig_Claussen
item.description:
@Craig_Claussen wrote:

Here is a link to show how to import your private key to the QT wallet.

I’m assuming you have your coins in the web wallet before.

How to import your BitBay Web Wallet private key into the peg-enabled QT wallet Dynamic Peg - FAQ
How to import your BitBay Web Wallet private key into the BitBay QT wallet: ***Note: The web wallet is currently on an old fork of BitBay. To spend any funds from your web wallet address, you must FIRST import your web wallet private key into the BitBay QT wallet application. This is MANDATORY until the web wallet is updated to work with the Dynamic Peg. If you have any questions, please leave a comment below. 1. Enter your wallet log-in information, and click “Load/Create Wallet” to gain acc…

Read full topic
item.source: How to restore old wallet with key files
